settings.text:
Now available in two dreamy flavors! Formulated to help you fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer, and improve quality of sleep. Get 15% off with code: 
CHALENE15

settings.heading: Calm Your Mind
settings.subtext: Easily power down after a long day and let your mind be gently rocked to sleep.

settings.heading: Quality Sleep
settings.subtext: Enjoy deep, restful sleep with a plant-based sleep solution that supports your natural circadian rhythm.

settings.heading: Tasty Relief
settings.subtext: Flavored with real blueberry extract - because sleep should taste delicious.

settings.text: As someone devoted to sleep health since my own brain scare in 2015 - I had tried practically every supplement on the market. Most didn’t work or left me feeling cloudy in the am. After months of working with the team at Soul I can finally say — GOOD NIGHT! Not only do these gummies taste delicious, but they contain the perfect amount of CBD, melatonin, and natural botanicals to help you get truly restorative sleep!
settings.name: XOXO

settings.heading: The Dream Team
settings.feature_text_1: Hemp derived cannabinol contains powerful relaxing properties known to improve the quality of REM sleep.
settings.feature_text_2: Natural aromatic compound found in plants promotes a calming, sedative effect to help you fall asleep faster.
settings.feature_text_3: Naturally occurring hormone that regulates the sleep-wake cycle, helping you fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer.
settings.feature_text_4: Organically grown CBD Isolate promotes sleep health by addressing the root causes of sleep issues.
settings.feature_text_5: Natural flavoring from real blueberries so you can taste your relief.
